public ref class EventSetterHandlerConverter sealed : System::ComponentModel::TypeConverter

summary.span: 將事件 Setter 處理常式的字串名稱轉換為委派表示。

span.span: Converts the string name of an event setter handler to a delegate representation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如需有關如何針對 WPF XAML 處理事件處理常式名稱的詳細資訊，請參閱[XAML 概觀 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)。For more information about how XAML for WPF processes event handler names, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
